title: Christine Meek was, until her recent retirement, Associate Professor of Medieval History at Trinity College, Dublin. She has written two books, Lucca 1369–1400: Politics and Society in an Early Renaissance City-State

note: published by Four Courts Press, Dublin. She is at present writing books on the Rule of Paolo Guinigi in Lucca and on Lucchese Women in the Middle Ages.
